trait.name: Mage Slaying
entries: When Valygar deals damage to a creature that is {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell, that creature has disadvantage on the saving throw it makes to maintain its {@status concentration}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Valygar makes two katana attacks and one hand crossbow attack or two hand crossbow attacks.

action.name: Katana
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Disrupt Spell
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of Valygar casts a spell, he can use his reaction to make a melee weapon attack against that creature.
